sentences.en: Aerate the soil by spiking with a fork.
Britons fork out more than a billion pounds a year on toys.
sentences.cn: 英国人每年花在玩具上的钱超过10亿英镑。

sentences.en: He stabbed at the omelette with his fork.
He will have to fork out for private school fees for Nina.
sentences.cn: 他得为尼娜付一大笔私立学校的学费。

sentences.en: I plunged in my knife and fork.
Just before the town boundary fork left onto a minor road.
sentences.cn: 快到城镇边界时要走岔路的左边一条小路。

sentences.en: Mash the bananas with a fork.
Put the knives and forks on the table.
Remove the meat with a fork and divide it among four plates.
sentences.cn: 用餐叉把肉叉走，分到4个盘里。

sentences.en: She impaled a lump of meat on her fork.
She laid down her knife and fork and pushed her plate away.
She poked at her food with a fork.
the north fork of the Sacramento river
sentences.cn: 萨克拉门托河的北向分流

sentences.en: The road divides; you should take the right fork.
sentences.cn: 路在这里分了岔；你应该走右边一条。

sentences.en: The spade and fork have longer shafts, providing better leverage.
sentences.cn: 锹和耙的手柄较长，可发挥较好的杠杆作用。

sentences.en: Then plonk, down went the fork.
sentences.cn: 随后啪的一声，叉子掉了。

sentences.en: to eat with a knife and fork

words.tran_cn: 成叉状；用叉（或耙）干活（fork的过去分词形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 铲车，叉车；叉式装卸车；万能装卸车
叉车，叉式装卸车；堆高机
(非正式)（尤指不情愿地）为…付钱
(非正式，主北美)同 fork something out
变速叉，换挡拨叉；齿轮换档叉

trans.tran_en: a tool you use for picking up and eating food, with a handle and three or four points
a tool you use for picking up and eating food, with a handle and three or four points
to put food into your mouth or onto a plate using a fork
